## AppRoutePredicate type

Determine if the [AppRoute](./foundation-shell.approute.md) should be integrated.

Provides app, micro frontend, and seed author fine-grained control over what assets they will accept in their target integration points.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AppRoutePredicate = (route: AppRoute, context?: AppContext) => boolean;
```
**References:** [AppRoute](./foundation-shell.approute.md), [AppContext](./foundation-shell.appcontext.md)
